channel.title: Comments on: Cleaning up non ascii chars for XML or other uses
channel.description: Web development notes and commentary from Ryan Stille

item.title: By: chris
item.dc:creator: chris
item.description: Thanks very much for this. Saved me a lot of trouble. However, I think the "i" in the Insert statement needs to be "i-1" as we&apos;ve just removed the "i"th character on the previous line.
item.content:encoded: Thanks very much for this. Saved me a lot of trouble. However, I think the "i" in the Insert statement needs to be "i-1" as we've just removed the "i"th character on the previous line.

item.title: By: Phill
item.dc:creator: Phill
item.description: I have also encountered this same issue and hope that Adobe pick this up and correct it soon.
item.content:encoded: I have also encountered this same issue and hope that Adobe pick this up and correct it soon.
